modName: Lagertha of the Vikings Face Preset and FOLLOWER
summary: Lagertha of the Vikings! This face preset was inspired by the fiercely talented Katheryn Winnick and her role as Lagertha on the TV show Vikings.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=5][size=4]This file is a Nexus exclusive. If it is found anywhere, including Bethesda.net (as I do have an account there), and is not uploaded by me, it is stolen. Please report any stolen mods you see. :)[/size]

[size=6][u][center]Lagertha of the Vikings[/center][/u][/size][/size][/b][center][img width=850,height=531]http://i989.photobucket.com/albums/af11/selenameeka/LagerthaReadyforBattle.jpg[/img][/center]

[center]*Note: Her expression is not like this in the preset, it's neutral. I did this for effect.[/center]
[size=3]I was reworking an old character of mine (see my website [url=https://selenameeka.wordpress.com/]here[/url]) and instead of doing an original face I decided to base her on Lagertha from Vikings! So when I finished the preset I thought I'd share with everyone. :) It's not perfect by any means, I'm still an amateur sculptor, but I thought some may like it and enjoy it.

She is made on the Breton race as that's the character I was designing her for, but she does work for any human race (colors might need to be reworked). I know she'd be great as a Nord!

[size=3][i]Edit: I went back and checked up on the face preset when I have the Nord race set. It kept coming out wrong for me today so I resculpted the face to work on the Nord race. If it doesn't work, let me know. [/i]Nord version is in the file section labeled accordingly.[/size]



[center][img width=860,height=523]http://i989.photobucket.com/albums/af11/selenameeka/Lagertha%20Comparison.jpg[/img][/center]
Also, her makeup and skin tone are done to the best of my abilities using my own monitor settings, ingame settings, and probably a different set of body and texture mods than you, dear user. I tried to follow the fact that she's pale with a yellow undertone and has a lot of light pink makeup on in the series (along with those smoldering eyes) so on some systems she might appear to have differently colored makeup, less makeup, more makeup, etc. The same goes for wrinkles. It's an easy fix in RaceMenu to change colors, I promise. Also, my game is set up for an ENB, but I took pictures in vanilla. Her poses are done in a late afternoon/early morning light, but I got the main photos in a neutral light.

I hope you enjoy! I would love screenshots, especially of the characters you make with this preset!


[size=3][b][size=5]ALSO INCLUDED IS A FILE FOR LAGERTHA AS A FOLLOWER! She is a [u]Nord[/u] and can be found in [u]Jorrvaskr[/u]. [size=5]A big thank you to[/size] [size=6][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/39363975/?]HOVIHAR[/url][size=6] who made her! And a big [size=6]THANK YOU[/size] to all the mod authors who allowed their assets to be used (see below for all credits)![/size][/size][/size][/b][/size]


[size=4]If there are any issues, please let me know ASAP and include pictures. [i]Pictures are very helpful.[/i][/size]

[size=5]
[u][b]Mods used in the screenshots:[/b][/u][/size][/size][list]
[*][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSky Hair for Females v1.5[/url][/size]
[*][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72586/?]Pride of Valhalla[/url] [/size]
[*][size=5]femaleface_msn.dds from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30181/?]Alt Navetsea UNP Seamless[/url] (only changed the “man” races, not “mer.”) (I only recommend this if you want a younger 30ish character, otherwise the .dds from the file looks fantastic and should be used first!)[/size]
[*][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]UNP Body[/url] (NSFW images, non-pornographic)[/size]
[*][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty[/url][/size]
[*][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79586/?]2K Lip Tints[/url][/size]
[*][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url][/size]
[/list]

[size=5][u][b]Installation:[/b][/u]
[i]Requires Racemenu and SKSE![/i][/size][list=1]
[*][size=5]Open your Data folder in Skyrim[/size]
[*][size=5]Download this file[/size]
[*][size=5]Open Lagertha and copy all the files from the data folder to your Skyrim's data folder[/size]
[/list][size=5]

[u]Permissions:[/u]
I have permissions from the authors I've used to create this preset (or permissions were granted on their mod pages). If you make something based on this preset and want to share it, I'd be happy to see it but you will still need permissions from the mods I've used linked above. If you are just making any fixes, let me know and I will host the file here so it's all in one place.
[/size]

[size=3][size=5][u]Credits:[/u]
[size=3][i]Please visit these mod author's pages to give them endorsements for their hard work! They deserve it! [/i][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/283148]apachii[/url] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSky Hair for Females[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1637400/?]dracofish[/url] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72586/?]Pride of Valhalla[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/133263]alt3rn1ty[/url] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30181/?]Alt Navetsea UNP Seamless[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/496662]navetsea[/url] for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554]CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/537675]dimon99[/url] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]UNP Female Body[/url]
[/size][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/21807674]evgirunslaad[/url] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79586/?]2K Lip Tints[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/30027]lthot[/url] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url]
[/size][/size]
